creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The NOTICE file is non-standard:

The 4th & 5th lines should say [1][2]:

This product includes software developed at
The Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).

Also, as far as I am aware, the text is not supposed to be indented.
See for example the httpd NOTICE file [3]

[1] http://www.apache.org/legal/src-headers.html#notice
[2] http://www.apache.org/dev/release.html#notice-require
[3] https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/httpd/httpd/trunk/NOTICE

(In reply to Sebb from comment #0)

URL fix:

> [2] http://www.apache.org/dev/release.html#notice-required
creator: sebb@apache.org
